lead_paragraph: The Sports of The Times column last Sunday, about decisions made in the American League Championship Series by Manager Joe Maddon of the Tampa Bay Rays, misstated the name of the college he attended. It is Lafayette College, not University.
snippet: The Sports of The Times column last Sunday, about decisions made in the American League Championship Series by Manager Joe Maddon of the Tampa Bay Rays, misstated the name of the college he attended. It is Lafayette College, not University.
